text: (And verily We left it as a token) as a sign for people, i.e. We left the ark of Noah, after the death of Noah, as a sign for people; it is also said that this means: We left the similitude of Noah as a sign for people; (but is there any that remembereth) is there any that will take admonition from what was done to the folk of Noah and, hence, desist from transgression?
